data.name: Boss_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]You've disturbed the nest of Golbats![br]Golbats disturb loudreds, loudreds disturb golem, golem disturbs aggron!

data.name: Boss_Line_Success_001
data.value: [tmp]The bosses settle down.

data.name: Carry_Line_001
data.value: [tmp](Carry) Some thugs beat our guys up in Copper Quarry! Teach them a lesson!

data.name: Carry_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]Some thugs beat our guys up in Copper Quarry! Teach them a lesson! (You already have the quest)

data.name: Carry_Line_003
data.value: [tmp](Carry) Thanks for getting back the supplies!

data.name: Carry_Line_004
data.value: [tmp](Carry) Thanks for protecting us!

data.name: Carry_Line_005
data.value: [tmp](Carry) We're getting ready to go to snow camp.

data.name: Carry_Line_006
data.value: [tmp](Carry) We'll get to snow camp in a day probably.

data.name: Carry_Line_Route
data.value: [tmp](carry) I'm on my routine route in cave camp!

data.name: Conjurer_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]Will we still be able to perform?

data.name: Conjurer_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]We're different than how we were when we set foot on this island.

data.name: Deliver_Line_001
data.value: [tmp](Deliver) Some thugs beat our guys up in Copper Quarry! Teach them a lesson!

data.name: Deliver_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]Some thugs beat our guys up in Copper Quarry! Teach them a lesson! (You already have the quest)

data.name: Deliver_Line_003
data.value: [tmp](Deliver) Thanks for getting back the supplies!

data.name: Deliver_Line_004
data.value: [tmp](Deliver) Thanks for protecting us!

data.name: Deliver_Line_005
data.value: [tmp](Deliver) We're getting ready to go to snow camp.

data.name: Deliver_Line_006
data.value: [tmp](Deliver) We'll get to snow camp in a day probably.

data.name: Deliver_Line_Route
data.value: [tmp](deliver) I'm on my routine route in cave camp!

data.name: Dragon_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]Gyarados and aerodactyl ask you to rescue charizard, who mysteriously left to snowbound path for an unknown reason.

data.name: Dragon_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]Gyarados and aerodactyl ask you to rescue charizard, who mysteriously left to snowbound path for an unknown reason.(you have the quest)

data.name: Dragon_Line_003
data.value: [tmp]Team Dragon is mentoring Vibrava, who has evolved into Flygon.

data.name: Dragon_Line_004
data.value: [tmp]Team Dragon is mentoring Vibrava, who has evolved into Flygon. (spoken to)

data.name: Dragon_Line_005
data.value: [tmp]Team Dragon is on a random cycle with a protege.

data.name: Dragon_Rescue_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]Charizard's rescued, and they all make up. Their mentorship on actual dragon types still comes back to reward them. They're humbled and re-motivated.

data.name: Dragon_Rescue_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]Team Dragon's humbled and re-motivated.

data.name: Goals_Done_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]So it was a Ninetales, I see.[br]Thanks for finding them for me. Here's your reward.

data.name: Goals_Help_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]I'm wounded and still recovering from a trip up Treacherous Mountain.[br]The Pokemon were nasty, and the weather was relentless.[br]But when I was near the end of my rope, a someone saved me.[br]I wonder who?

data.name: Goals_Help_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]Someone saved me up Treacherous Mountain.[br]I wonder who?

data.name: Goals_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]I don't want to go to the desert, I want to challenge myself this way.

data.name: Goals_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]We'll go our separate ways.

data.name: Goals_Line_003
data.value: [tmp]I'm pushing towards the next dungeon.

data.name: Goals_Line_004
data.value: [tmp]I'll need to be cautious.

data.name: Loud_Boss_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]We're all still raising a ruckus!

data.name: Loud_Boss_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]Everyone be quiet. We're moving out.

data.name: Loud_Boss_Line_003
data.value: [tmp]Y-Yes sir!

data.name: Loud_Boss_Line_004
data.value: [tmp]Wow he didn't even have to raise his voice.

data.name: Loud_Rabble_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]Stop screeching! We're raising a ruckus!

data.name: Rival_1_Help_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]Explorer! I need your help![br]Zangoose is stuck in Thunderstruck pass![br]Please rescue her!

data.name: Rival_1_Help_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]Zangoose is stuck in Thunderstruck pass![br]Please rescue her![br]No I'm not going in there and making her think I care![br]You have to do it!

data.name: Rival_1_Help_Line_003
data.value: [tmp]Thanks for saving my rival.[br]My life would be incomplete without being able to rub my victory in my sworn enemy's face.

data.name: Rival_1_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]I can't stand that zangoose! I can't let her get ahead of me!

data.name: Rival_2_Help_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]Thanks for saving me![br]I hope Seviper didn't see that.[br]Here's your reward!

data.name: Rival_2_Help_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]I'm going to reach the guildmasters first, and then Seviper will see which one of us is superior!

data.name: Rival_2_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]I can't stand that seviper! I can't let her get ahead of me!

data.name: Rock_Boss_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]Augh! I hate the sound those loudreds make it pierces my ears![br]Everything used to be quiet until the pack of loudreds moved in.[br]They can't stand the golbats, and we can't stand them when they raise their voice![br]They were migrating with an exploud pack leader but he disappeared and now the others are just squatting here.[br]Go to Veiled Ridge to find the exploud.

data.name: Rock_Boss_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]Go to Veiled Ridge to find the exploud.

data.name: Rock_Boss_Reward
data.value: [tmp]Thanks for taking care of things.[br]Have a token of our gratitude.

data.name: Screech_Rabble_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]We're screeching![br]The rock types don't mind it but the loudreds do!

data.name: Seer_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]I've evolved![br]I have premonitions when staring into the fire now.

data.name: Seer_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]We're team occult! Let me read your fortune.

data.name: Storehouse_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]Thanks for discovering this cave. We're putting supplies here.

data.name: Storehouse_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]Some thugs beat our guys up in Copper Quarry! Teach them a lesson!

data.name: Storehouse_Line_003
data.value: [tmp]Some thugs beat our guys up in Copper Quarry! Teach them a lesson! (You already have the quest)

data.name: Storehouse_Line_004
data.value: [tmp]Thanks for getting back the supplies! Have a reward!

data.name: Storehouse_Line_005
data.value: [tmp]Thanks for protecting us!

data.name: Storehouse_Line_006
data.value: [tmp]We're getting ready to go to snow camp.

data.name: Storehouse_Line_007
data.value: [tmp]We'll get to snow camp in a day probably.

data.name: Storehouse_Line_Route
data.value: [tmp]I'm on my routine route in cave camp!

data.name: Strategy_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]I don't want to keep going this way. I want to explore the desert.

data.name: Strategy_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]I think this is where we part.
